name: Dodge It! Online
description:
In this online competitive game, you will have to do your best to survive as long as possible by dodging balls that can kill you in no time!
Play up to 100 player in the same server!
In this game you have many options, play competitively by making the most score you can without dying or simply just talk with other players in the lobby you can even play soccer with them! Otherwise if you want to play it solo just ignore the other players.

Level up system!
the more ball you collect the more xp you get wich mean you will get level show other player how far you get!

what would a game be without personalization of your appearance? well this is not the case in this game! in Dodge It! Online, the more you play the more item you will gain, with the items you gain apply them to your character and show it to the world!

so what are you waiting for? join us!
